text:
Excellent Stay - Group Mahasiswa Pasca Sarjana Poltekpar Bali

Kami rombongan Mahasiswa Pasca Sarjana Poltekpar Bali berkesempatan menginap di Aston Inn Mataram pada tanggal 22 dan 25 Mei 2022.Rombongan tiba di hotel sekitar Pkl.21.00 Wita dan langsung disambut dengan ramah oleh Pak Danny Sinaga selaku General Manager didampingi oleh Pak Junaidi Room Division Manager.Ditengah suasana pandemi Covid19 hotel ini terlihat sangat ramai dibandingkan hotel-hotel lain yang kami kunjungi selama Praktek Kerja Lapangan di Lombok dan Gili Trawangan.Menurut saya keunggulan Aston Inn Mataram adalah sebagai berikut : 

1.	Lokasi : Letak hotel sangat strategis.Banyak tersedia minimarket dan coffee shop didekat hotel. 

2.	Staff : Receptionist,Bellboy dan Waiters : sangat ramah,cepat dan efisien.Tampaknya karyawannya dilatih dengan baik.Congratulation untuk GM dan RDM-nya.

3.	Kamar : Pada tanggal 22 Mei 2022 saya menginap di kamar Superior Pool View di lantai 5.Selanjutnya ditanggal 25 Mei 2022 saya menginap di kamar Superior Pool Access. Bagi Anda yang suka berenang dan gym,saya sarankan menginap di kamar type Superior Pool Access untuk memudahkan akses ke kolam renang dan gym. Ukuran kamarnya cukup besar dan nyaman.Selain itu kamarnya SANGAT BERSIH begitupun dengan linen dan towel. Air panas dan AC SEMPURNA.

4.	Breakfast : SEMPURNA. 
Secara umum kami sangat menikmati menginap di Aston Inn Mataram.Jika berkesempatan kembali ke Mataram tentu Aston Inn Mataram akan menjadi pilihan utama.

Terima kasih kepada Pak Danny Sinaga (GM)  dan Pak Junaidi (RDM) yang telah menyambut kami dengan hangat sejak Check In dan berkesempatan bertemu dengan kami semua saat check out guna memastikan bahwa semuanya tertangani dengan baik.

Sukses terus untuk Aston Inn Mataram. See you when I see you.

Salam,
Marcel Paga
title: EXCELLENT STAY

owner_response.text:
Yang Terhormat Bapak Marcel,

Saya mewakili manajemen Aston Inn Mataram mengucapkan terima kasih kepada Anda dan grup Pasca Sarjana Poltekpar Bali yang telah memilih hotel kami sebagai tempat akomodasi selama di Mataram. text:
Pengalaman pertama menginap di Aston Inn Mataram Lombok NTB sangat luar biasa. Saat masuk ke hotel, mulai dr staff operasional sampai ke Manajemen yg ditemui sgt ramah, very helpful dan welcome kpd tamu. 
Proses check-in yg cepat, bell boy yg ramah dan helpful mengantar ke kamar. Kamarnya sungguh amazing, bersih plus harum, sprei dan handuk tanpa noda dan tampak terawat serta harum, apalagi toilette yg jg bersih tak ada noda kotoran (ini yg terpenting!) dan air yg keluar dari kran/shower yg berlimpah dan segar tanpa bau, baik air panas maupun dingin. Saat housekeeper dimintain tolong sesuatu, merespon dg cepat dan sopan, spt saat saya meminjam mukena dan sajadah (yg bersih dan harum). 
Pengalaman makan di restaurant saat breakfast sgt luar biasa : penataan rapi dan bersih, menu makanan yg sgt bervariasi dan tdk monoton, minuman banyak pilihan spt kopi, latte, cappuchino dll, aneka juice yg rasanya enak, pelayanan waiter/waitress clear up meja sgt cepat, chef yg kadang menyapa tamu dg ramah (penting!), 
Mnrt saya, pantas jika hotel ini selalu rame trs dg tingkat okupansi yg trs tinggi 2 digit mendekati sempurna. Kita pantas acungin 2 jempol utk pelayanan prima hotel dan staff hotel, tdk kalah dg hotel bintang 5 yg ada di area Nusa Dua Bali dan sktarnya. Inshaa Allah akan balik lg ke sana dg anak2 utk explore Lombok dlm wktu dekat.
Yuuuks buat yg mau ke Lombok, jgn ragu menginap di Aston Inn Mataram ! Reservasi skr sblm kehabisan, apalagi nanti saat ada event2 besar spt  Moto GP di Mandalika dll. Buruaaaan guuyyyss...!!
Terima kasih kpd Manajemen dan semua Staff Aston Inn Mataram. Selamat dan sukses selalu !! Horaaassss🙏💝👍👍

text:
Saya memesan kamar suite di hotel ini untuk 3 malam. Kamar sedikit besar, sarapan memiliki banyak pilihan, hanya ada 2 elevetor untuk guest dan pekerja. Ada sebuah keluarga yang menempati 3 kamar di sekitar kami. Mereka punya anak kecil yang sering teriak2 dan lari2an di sepanjang koridor padahal ada sign "quite zone" yang artinya dimohon untuk tenang. Kami sempat menegur beberapa kali karena sangat mengganggu ketenangan terlebih saya harus bekerja juga di dalam hotel. Namun tetap saja keluarga tersebut sangat berisik. Mereka membuka pintu kamar lebar2 sehingga tamu lain bisa mendengar percakapan atau apapun yang mereka lakukan di dalam kamar. 

Selain itu kami kehilangan 2 "do not distrub" sign selama 2 hari berturut2. Anehnya saat itu keluarga tersebut pindah kedepan kamar kami. Karena tanda do mor distrub tersebut hilang, petugas kebersihan pun masuk kedalam kamar saat kami tidak ada di hotel. Hal ini tentu mengganggu terlebih banyak barang2 penting di dalam kamar. Kami bahkan menemukan 1 do not distrub sign di depan elevetor yang jaraknya sebanyak 3 kamar ditambah terdapat belokan. Kami sudah komplain tapi tidak tahu apakah komplain ini ditanggapi atau tidak karena tidak ada penjelasan lebih lanjut terkait hal ini.

text:
Aston inn - mataram, lombok

Aston! Siapa sih yang gak tau chain hotel 1 ini. Chain hotel 1 ini selalu menawarkan hotel yang berkelas namun dengan harga yang sangat reasonable.

Chain hotel ini tersebar di seluruh indonesia, dan selalu jadi pilihan dimanapun kita mengunjungi suatu daerah. Dan saat saya ke mataram, saya pun memilih untuk menginap do Aston inn mataram ini.

Hotel ini memiliki qualitu standartd seperti hotel2 aston yang lain d indonesia, kamar yang cukup luas, bersih dan sangat nyaman. Ditambah dengan kasur yang empuk, kamar mandi dengan perlengkapan yang lengkap, benar2 membuat hotel ini semakin menjadi plihan untuk budget dan business traveler.

1 lagi kelebihan aston inn di mataram ini, letaknya yang super strategis. Terletak d jantung kota, dekat dengan jalan besar dan jalan ramai di mataram, dekat dengan mini mart, dan tempat makan. Benar-benar kelebihan yang selalu saya cari saat memilih suatu penginapan.

text:
saya menginap di akhir november 2019 lalu. 
Dari segi lokasi, hotelnya sangat berada di pusat kota, dan tidak terlalu jauh dari destinasi wisata yang saya tuju selama 4 hari 3 malam. 
Segi kamar, kamarnya sangat comfy dan loveable to stay tentunya dengan affordable rate sangat sesuai dengan apa yg sudah saya dapat.
hal Negatif yang saya dapat adalah :
1. pada malam ketiga saya stay, saya telfon ke Reception untuk meminjam sendok kurang lebih pukul sembilan, lalu reception kalau tidak salah yang bernama Angga yang answer, dia bilang ok. namun sampai keesokan harinya juga kami belum mendapatkan sendok yg kami request semalam. Padahal di pintu kami tidak ada Sign DND.

2. Pada saat malam ke 3 juga, saya dan pasangan memilih untuk spending waktu di GYM / fitness centre. kami melewati bar, karna memang letaknya di samping bar dan 1 gedung dengan SPA. peralatannya sangat Minim dan alakadarnya, yang sangat negative adalah ketika saya sedang olahraga, staff laki laki dan perempuan menonton kami dari Bar yang hanya di batasi dinding kaca, mereka semua melihat dan menatap kami seolah pertama kali melihat guest yang sedang GYM. Ini sangat membuat kami tidak nyaman, dan RISIH! sangat TIDAK BAGUS kedepannya. 

Management harus membuat ACTION PLAN untuk mentraining staff nya, agar lebih menjaga attitude respect terhadap Guest. Respect the guest Privacy, and make the guest comfortable during their stay.

text: We were staying at a nearby hotel but sadly the breakfast and terrible service from staff forced us to look elsewhere for dining options and we came across the Aston Inn. Our first contact was with Dayu at thec front desk, we enquired about breakfast then about booking a tour and she went out of her way to escort us up to breakfast then later directed us to the tour desk. Over the next few days at breakfast all the staff knew who we were and welcomed us with smiles everyday. The general manager Danny heard we were not staying but came for breakfast and at times cocktails and welcomed us. If we had not already paid at the other hotel we would have moved. We were treated like guests even though we didnt stay whereas at our hotel they never acknowledged us or greeted or said hello. Such a difference in service
title: Fantastic staff and great location

text:
This review is from me as an european tourist travelling around asia for a few month, and I'm sure that if you are asian and travelling with another reason it might be different. But to me this was just horrible. 

Newbuilt hotel and it looks very nice and rooms are comfortable if you have a room with balcony or window. But half of the rooms dosen't have windows to look out from or open.
Pool area was very nice, like a rooftop area with alot of seats. A bar but totally useless for someone not speaking indonesian because no one working in the poolbar are able to speak a word english. I couldn't even ask a simlpe question. 

Cleaning wasn't great. 

TERRIBLE internet connection 
- If you travel for work and are in need of internet I advice you to stay away! 

New opened gym was a joke.

Breakfast with only chinese dishes and one type of bread and disgusting selection of sides for making a simple sandwich. 
Just dont pay for breakfast if you dont like eating noodles, rice and beef stew in the morning. You will end up eating the exactly same breakfast as you get for free when you are staying in a small simlpe cozy bungalow hotel anyways. 

Planned to use the spa on the hotel but gave up when I triend talking to the lady behind the info desk in the lobby. NOT A SIMPLE QUESTION IN ENGLISH IS POSSIBLE TO ANSWER! 

Last but most terrible thing about the stay-
Do not make your laundry here. Omg what a rip off! 
Of all the hotels and places I've left my laundry for the last two month in both Thailand and Indonesia it's been super cheap. In Aston Inn they proably making all there money on this because I left maybe maximum 2 kg of laundry and ended up paying 419.000 Rupies. That's just such a rip off and just lack of respect for hotel guests. 
You can find much much cheaper nearby so worth the extra walk. 
Not very fun to pay checking out and already misshappy with the stay! 

Thank you for making Mataram and Lombok not nice at all.
title: Never again

text:
I was travelling to Lombok by myself to study, and it was my first time being in Indonesia alone. I was booked in for 9 nights but ended up extending it to 12.
Firstly, the rooms: super clean, world's biggest bed, lovely bathroom, open space, deliciously cool aircon and complimentary water that is replaced EVERY DAY (usually hotels only give you one round of complimentary water). Also all the soaps/tit bits in the bathroom, the tea/coffee station is also replaced EVERY DAY. 
Location: It is very central in terms of it is located in the "city" region of Lombok, its 5 minutes from Mataram mall and very close to many restaurants, commercial shops and amenities like telkomsel Grapari, grocery stores, hair salons, laundry services, banks. However, if you are after a roll-out-of-bed-and-into-the-ocean kind of place, expect a 20minute cab first (to Senggigi). 

Facilities: it is quite new, so when I got there the gym was/is still being put together BUT is coming along very well with a nice variety of equipment and floor space too (it also has aircon and a shower). The pool is lovely, there is no lifeguard so there's no real "deep end" (1.4m) but plenty of deckchairs, very clean and of course, theres also a bar. There is also a spa which offers a variety of massages, facials, reflexology, stone treatments and all sorts again at a very reasonable price (1hr massage $16 AUD).
Food: They were just putting in a new menu when I was leaving but quite diverse and obviously reasonably priced - most expensive thing being like $17AUD, most items less than $10AUD. But the star (as it always is) was the breakfast buffet (~$9AUD p/p). They have a pastry section, fruits section, cereals, juices, egg station, waffle/pancake station and of course, hot food. For European travellers, the hot food is primarily of asian cuisine - ie fried rice/noodles, veggies and meat dishes - I didn't see any bacon but there were sausages. If you are into asian food, please be wowed, they have a bubur station (rice porridge station) where you can customise your bubur with all these toppings and condiments and just, truly a dream. 
 
Finally, service: THIS IS WHERE YOU NEED TO TAKE A SEAT AND LISTEN.  The staff here are SO friendly, and the manager, Niyar, goes beyond the call of duty, truly. I was travelling alone, so I was already a bit scared, but I was also there over NYE (alone, seriously I knew no one). I was so indecisive, but I last minute decided to go to Gili T, by this time though I had missed the public boat and taxis were going to be $$$ SO reception organised a personal driver for me for a set price (who also picked me up the next day from the port). Unfortunately, I ended up getting INCREDIBLY sick that night and my driver was super understanding and promptly picked me up and took me back to Aston. I stayed in my hotel room for two straight days, absolutely exhausted. Because my stomach was super sensitive, I couldnt order anything from the room service (spices, herbs etc.) so when I asked reception where my nearest option for Bubur Ayam (rice porridge with chicken, highly recommend in times of runny bums), the manager DROVE OUT TO GET IT FOR ME, DELIVERED IT TO MY ROOM AND THEN WOULD NOT LET ME PAY FOR IT. CAN YOU READ?? CAN YOU SEE THAT LEVEL OF SERVICE?? Instead of only suggesting hotel menu food, he went out of his way to get me food that would benefit my health and WOULD NOT ACCEPT MY MONEY. Also, every single staff member smiles and says hi to you and is just so SO courteous, the front desk literally became my pals and Shofi (bless this gal) gave me a friendship bracelet. Also, the staff are all locals and can give you plentyyy of advice (as well as organising tours for you) on all the sights to see, things to do and travel tips/recommendations.
So I cannot say a single bad thing about my stay, I honestly felt so at home and all the staff made me feel so welcome and truly cared for - not just some guest or room number. 
If you are in Mataram by yourself (or with family too of course), treat yourself to a stay at the Aston Inn, honestly you won't regret it.
title: Like staying in the Warbuck's Mansion

text: After taking the ferry from Bali to Lombok (public one) we were desperate to find a hotel in the middle of the night and Aston inn had reasonable price and very good quality. We were supposed to stay only one night, but the idea of sleeping one more night in those amazing beds won us over. The breakfast was included in the price and had a nice selection of local foods, salad bar, dessert bar, omelet bar, soup bar, pancake bar and of course fresh bread and croissants and cereal. Very beautiful hotel with clean and nice rooms, and excellent air-conditioning. Own private balcony overlooking the huge mosque, which is lit with changing colors every night is a sight not to miss. Just really beautiful, high quality hotel with friendly and helpful staff. Would go again anytime. Oh, and the internet is far better than anything else we have had while staying almost 3 weeks in Bali - Lombok.
title: 2 night stay in Aston Inn

text:
We are having holiday for 4D3N 3 rooms in this hotel. 2 superior rooms and 1 deluxe room. Hoping this hotel is a clean, good service, quite to rest, etc for my happy mood holiday. But we got different. Waited so long to get the room key. It was 02.30 pm already. After registered we still wait 10 minutes the room is not ready clean yet. I tell the receptionist to hurry up because we were tired. And then he gave me only 1 room for superior. And then i angry again to him because we didn't want to wait. The time was 03.15 pm we still at lobby. After that he gave me 1 key again for deluxe room. We go to our room first still left 1 superior room is not ready yet. We opened the superior room is okay but left many dust below the bed. The deluxe room is smell smoke, i need to change it. The hotel is okay but i must waiting again and again. They said 1 superior was ready i can use it first. But i said the superior room was not mine but for my family. I didn't want to use it. So i must wait again the deluxe room until 05.20 pm. Imagine how good is this hotel. They offer me compensation to drop me free to airport. I refuse it because it's already prepare before we arriving. Until now they didn't response anything again. Hope this hotel make a big change for a good reputation.

text:
In the first step of the check-in process... I got very insulted by Jaka, the receptionist. For me, that alone would be enough to make it the worst Aston. 

Now comes the room. It has a fake window, but with noises. If you're claustrophobic, dont even try this one. I thought if they're gonna lock it out, at least please make it soundproof. I could hear dog's bark, weird spooky chanting from nearby buildings, etc.

I'm here for business and my friend booked rooms here for the 3 of us. I dont know what deal she made and how low the price she negotiated, but I never expect it would be like this. Now I am here by condition. I won't be here by choice.

The name says it all. They named it Aston Inn, not Hotel. It really lives up to its name. Successfully.

Mind yourself and find a hotel, or inns with hotel-like services and friendly staffs. 
Wont be that hard, Lombok is actually full of them.
title: Simply the W.O.R.S.T Aston

text:
Good things about the hotel: 
- friendly staff
- great breakfast with lots of options
Bad things: 
- A big Indonesian family with many loud children were in neighbouring rooms and they kept their doors open and the kids were running and screaming in the hallways. We complained to front desk and this helped briefly but the noises continued and the awful children even stole our "do not disturb" signs two days in a row. They even threw it on the ground near the elevator. (Since our room was at the end of the hallway, nobody else comes near our door except this family). Hotel management said they would take action but I suspect they aren't too harsh because they don't want to make the family customer who buys 4 rooms unhappy just to please a customer who only pays for one room. 
- The "suite" room is just a slightly bigger than an average room, but with an extra sofa. However, the price was still reasonable and the room was still pretty good for the price.
- location: Mataram was a disappointing city overall and Aston's location near Mataram Mall should be nice but the mall was sadly half-empty with lots of shut-down shops (but one fantastic Lombok-cuisine restaurant). The Epicentrum Mall is far more lively but it requires a Grab/taxi ride. Google Maps shows lots of laundry places nearby but most of them have shut down too.
title: OK hotel but bad experience due to unruly guests

text:
In total I stayed 9 nights in Aston over a periode of two weeks. The last morning I asked for an extension of another 3 nights. The reception confirmed!! On the evening of the following day I RANDOMLY passed the reception again and was told that the hotel is fully booked on the next days and that I have to check out.
Sorry guys, this is an absolute NO GO!

Furthermore:

The stuff is using the same elevators as the guests. So sometimes it takes you 5 minutes to get from the 6th floor to the lobby. Consider using the stairway.

The stuff's Englisch ahead from the standard phrases is bad... common guys, its 2020 and the numbers of Western tourists on Lombok are steadily increasing. Sponsor your employees some English lessons, then you don't run into problems like that. It's a matter of the management, not of the stuff!

At least there is Beer available for a relatively normal price... which is not usual in the islamic state of Lombok.
title: Not amused!!!

One of my favorite choice hotel to visit in Mataram is Aston Inn. The place is in the center of the city easy access from any places. They offers variance of food promotion and very competitive price compare the other places,every Friday afternoon they offers free coffee promotion which is rare and on daily they have also coffee promotion.
They have wide range of menu variety from Western to local authentic cuisine and also very unique taste of croissant with salted egg ( I  personally recommend this whenever you visit), a cozy place at their pool bar on the third floor also very welcome and friendly staff since we arrived. You can also enjoy a live music on Friday afternoon at pool side while enjoy the sunset.

definitely recommended place to hang out with friends!
title: shocking food and drink promotions!

text:
We can only say good things about this hotel! From the moment we arrived up until we checked out everything was perfect.
The room was clean, spacious and had great amenities. Pool area is well maintained and very clean. 
The best thing about this hotel it the staff who were fantastic! You don’t get this kind of service in some of the 5star hotels as we got it from staff at this hotel. Special mention to Novi who looked after us during breakfast - great chat! 
Make sure that you get yourself a breakfast at the hotel but don’t buy it with your room. You can pay on the day you have breakfast which is much cheaper - £3. Food was delicious and had so much choice that is unbelievable. 
Definitely recommend this hotel! 
Will stay here again when in Mataram
title: You must stay here!

I come to lombok to do business in Sengiggi but for a 20 minute drive to mataram its totally worth the effort. The manager Juniadi came up and introduced himself and made me feel special such a nice touch. Now to go one step further i accidentally left my expensive burberry glasses there, so i messaged pak juniadi and in less than 5 minutes he located them and put them aside for me ti collect them. text: hotel was nice, they were constantly cleaning, it was spottless. the staff were really friendly. i liked the idea of the water cooler rather than bottles of water in the room. found the beds comfortable. breakfast was basic, but was nice, had omlette toast and salad. the swimming pool area was relaxing with 5 small bintang bottles in a bucket for 100,000 ($10 AUD) coffee 95,000 (95cents AUD) Matram Mall was 5 min walk around the corner, there was a couple of shops on the way. the mall had a Macdonalds and a supermarket, and few shops but run down. taxi to Epicentrum mall from here was 20,000 ($2 AUD) this mall was bigger and nice shops to wander around, also had a supermarket. and plenty of eateries. nice for a couple of hours to wander. we did like the hotel, but there was not anything really to do here in Matram city for us.

The view is mostly city buildings and streets. It takes about 30 minutes to Senggigi Beach, about 1.5 hours to the airport.
title: City hotel, young and dynamic

text:
Stayed late july for one evening following a late flight.
The hotel is well presented and provides a good breakfast and is easy to get provisions as a shop is next door.
When booking please make sure if you don't smoke , or have given them up that you stipulate a NON SMOKING room ,as we were given a room that stank.
We were moved after some hassle to another room that did not stink ,as apparently the hotel suites we had booked were 100% full.
The manager in the morning,Junaidi , not the previous evening manager, Mr Indal, was very professional in his dealings with us, and offered transportation as a peace offering, which was appreciated.
DAYU the front office lady was extremely professional and could not do more to help us .She is a great asset to this hotel and should be trained for Management.
title: CLEAN , TIDY AND REASONABLE VALUE

text:
It is ideally located in the heart of the city. It is close from nice food and shopping for present & souvenirs. 
Despite its small location I was impressed by the spacious athmosphere I feel in the lobby. It has high ceiling as if openwide to welcome guess. Reception & staff we met are friendly. The lift is quite nice, it has decorated mirror - you can check whether you look okay or not 😊 
When I came into the room, tara I love it, it has a soft color that makes the room look spacious enough.  The bed is comfortable and big, it can sleep 3 people. Walked to the balcony, I drew a curtain aside. I loved what I see a swimming pool with frangipany trees decorating the roof top garden. The dark wooden floor & plants hanging from the balcony cooling down the eyes after seeing the crowd below.  I forget that it is actually at the  most busy intersection in Mataram. Standard room in 5th floor close to the lift was a nice room. I think as well as the right height from the pool, it is a high enough height to enjoy the sunset. 
We sat at the cafe enjoying afternoon tea. I love the round chocolaty cake and the tea.
title: A cool & comfortable hotel at the heart of Mataram

text:
This is the second time that i was staying at the hotel for a business trip. after long trip from Chengdu, China to Bali then Lombok, i would like to get a better look at the Aston Inn as my first choice in Mataram. The building is nice and the swimming pool is small, enough to cater a small party. The check in process was smooth, however they did not seem to recognize a repeater guest, they should have that program. at least they will be able to recognize the guest by name during the stay. I told the FO that this is my second stay, no welcome back note from the hotel. it might be not the standard, but they can push to that direction. As usual, the room was clean and tidy. Only the first day that I must tell them the blower for drying the carpet at the corridor had to be stopped as it was ON from morning till late evening. I am coming for a business, so the internet is considered my major tool to be connected to my colleagues in China. The internet was slow, they should fix it, especially when we were staying on the higher floor. 
The staffs are very accommodating, especially the F&B staffs who always taking care our meals during breakfast and lunch. 
I think the Aston Inn gets all the necessary to run as 4 star hotel. I will  be back for sure.
title: Second Stay - Great again

text:
I stay for two nights in big room no 700. provided with sofa and table.
the room is in the corner position facing the street, so you will have two view, one is landscape view with hills in the distance and from the other side is pool view. because corner room have big window with plenty of sun, it might be a little warm in the day, but just turn the AC at max and it will be OK. 

You may ask front office the key to small balcony (i think every room has it), maybe if you want to smoke. I don't know if they have smooking room or not.

Shower only have one showerhead no hand shower, and the stream are not so powerfull, just enough to clean and get fresh. Also no hand bidet for the toilet, but semi-automatic bidet. They provide mositurizer lotion. 

There is minimarket like 7-11 just beside the hotel. and bluebird Taxi always standby beside the lobby.
If you have to go early morning before 6 am, they can give you breakfast before it open, just ask the front office. We had cake and bread apropriate enough.

When a problem occur the staff are quick in response.
title: Fast response

text:
During my brief visit to Lombok - traveling to the North/North Eastern region of the island where the series of earthquakes damaged about 75% of the buildings - it was such a wonderful experience to find that the welcome to the Aston Inn Hotel Mataram was a balm to my sadness and grief of what my team of the YKS faced.
In my travels around Indonesia, the quality of service never disappoints, and the service-mindedness of the young staff and its level of spoken English is, on average, much higher than in other parts of Indonesia.
My husband and I love staying at this location, because of its accessibility to the other parts of the island and it's convenient to the centre of Mataram
title: Home from Home

text:
I am staying in the Aston Inn as we were moved to Mataram after the earthquake on Sunday 5th August in the eve. During this difficult time the hotel staff have been incredible, our safety has been their number one priority.
When we first arrived we had to sit on the streets to ensure that no buildings fell on us and we were given sheets, towels, blankets, food and water to help us. We stayed the night and although we slept downstairs in the lobby they ensured that everyone was comfortable and had exits that could be reached easily in the event of an aftershock.
It is a gorgeous hotel with wonderful facilities but the staff are who truly make it excellent. They are dedicated to their guests and do everything that they can to help even in the wake of a catastrophic event.
title: A light in the darkness

The check-in process was quick, clean bedroom, clean and crisp bed sheet, comfy bed, fluffy towel, clean bathroom, breakfast food was good and there was a lot of food options, pleasant interior that reflect the local Lombok culture, and friendly staff. Overall, it was a nice and clean hotel. Very Aston standard. However, the sink in the bathroom was clogged a bit and the water did not go through quickly enough when we brushed our teeth. Not nice. I would have given a 5-stars, however, I am giving a 4-stars, instead. Success to Aston Inn Mataram!

text: Stayed to 2 Nights in 'Mataram City'. All Staff were incredibility friendly & helpful. Room was nice and clean with good facilities and amenities. Hotel location was very central and was a easy walk to most shops within Town Center. Can get a Taxi to Airport in under 30 minutes. Good breakfast, huge bed and wide flat screen . Good amenities, with balcony pool view . "Mataram" is a more Tradition Indonesian City. Not so many Tourists or Western faces in the streets -  well worth a visit, but can be a bit more challenging. Staying at  the "Aston Inn"' made the whole experience a lot easier & more enjoyable.

text: Overall, it is a fair hotel. The location is quite strategic, near to the Mataram mall and many food restaurant options surrounding. The hotel has seven floors with a small swimming pool and a bar (next to it) at the third floor. Inside the room there are conventional AC, many cool TV cable channels, nice design bathroom. Unfortunately, when I was stayed there there was an electrical disruption in the whole building which make the internet and TV channels connection were shut-down for some times. Additionally, the drainage under the shower probably clogged which make water-logged on your feet. Some rooms at the third floor does not have view because the window is covered with some steel frame which I do not know the function. Some rooms at the third floor directly facing the pool in front of your window, so you could watch people swimming and people in the pool could see you inside the room unless you close it with curtain. With such the price, I would expected more improvement from the hotel. Beyond that, this hotel has a pretty design which I liked it.
title: A unique hotel in Mataram

owner_response.text:
Dear Reno T, 

We are really appreciate and thank you for taking your precious time to review your recently stay at Aston Inn Mataram. It is pleasure to received your feedback. We value your compliment that our hotel location is quite strategic, close to shopping center and you are happy the design of rooms as well as the variety of our breakfast.

We however regret to hear about the inconvenient experience you have encountered with an electrical was disruption which resulted internet connection and TV channel being disconnected and clogged drains causing stagnant water. Please accept our sincere apologies for the shortfalls that you have experienced.
Your comments have been noted and we have discussed all the points addressed to all of head departments. Some of the issues will be rectified immediately while we will make continues effort to improve all the aspects of our services.

Thank you for your feedback and we do hope to have an opportunity to welcoming you back in the future at Aston Inn Mataram to make up for the unpleasant experience.



Regards, 

Junaidi
Front Office Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text:
So far so good, new hote, the Giant supermarket is mins away by car, but a few things that need to be improved. 

We (2 adults and 1 child) stayed 2 nights at the Junior Suite room on the 12/F (highest in the building), the room itself and the bathroom are very spacious, still very spacious after adding an extra bed and with 3 big luggage.  Our room was facing  the green fields and also the main street, during the busy afternoon, we can hear the cars, the praying from the temples nearby, but at night time, it quite down.   The room has a single sofa chair and a small table by the window, can enjoy the panoramic view of the city.  The air con also cold enough and adjustable.  However, maybe because we stayed on the upper floor, the shower was very very weak, at last we rather wash hair under the tap.  The bedsheet was not very clean with some yellow smelly spots....   There is no clock in the room which sometimes not  very convenient.    Also, more bottle water should be provided to guests, we called the housekeeping (9 out of 10 times, line busy, and we need to call either the front desk or room service for service) for bottle water, but the officer said 2 bottles per day only.  The breakfast was quite good, except the restaurant is not cold enough.
title: Not bad, can be better

If you want to visit lombok, i suggest you to stay in this hotel. This hotel located in the Mataram city.
I decided to stay here because the location is between north lombok and west lombok.
Clean, nice service, nice location too.
1st day, i rent a bike, this is the number 087765448040 (lombok rent bike) they delivered the bike to the place where we want. I visited west lombok by bike, there are soooo much beautiful beaches and places to see there. Those beaches more thn what i expected before!! I suggest you to stay at this hotel so you can visit west lombok and north lombok wih bike!

text:
It was a 4 days holiday in Lombok Island. We choosed Aston Inn in Mataram for our few nights pit stop before we proceed for our Deep Sea Fishing trip in a deeper and further part of Lombok Island.

Aston Inn located in a kind of busy place. I dont like the traffic in this location. Busy during weekdays.

The food was good but as for breakfast maybe you need to be.more varieties kind of food selection. Services was good even the hotel always busy. 

Thank you for the complimentary room upgrade and delicious honeymoon cake. We love it👌😉❤ My room was nicely decorated but unfortunately they locked my window with blindly view. Don't know why... It's kind of suffocated a little bit.. At night the dog keep on barking and this really disturbing us to get a good rest and sleep.

Overall not bad and I believe Aston Inn Mataram can do better in future. Few things need to be done and check to make the services better .

Good Luck !
title: Not bad for an Aston chain in Mataram

text:
Stayed for 3 nights last week here. Requested for twin-beds room as we were travelling with children.But the lady suggested for a one-bed room that's located just beside the pool. At first we were afraid that the bed would be too small for 4 of us.. but it turned out that the bed is so big. Perfect recommendation from the receptionist. The children loved the pool view, and we got to enjoy some live music on Saturday Night (there was a live music at the pool bar).
I am satisfied with the breakfast that had a lot of varieties and some of the menu differed from one day to another. They had Western and Indonesian food, also a local food offered. 
The staffs were super friendly.. and they have their way with children.

Overall, I am very satisfied with my stay here..
title: Comfortable Stay!
